## Welcome to My Portfolio

Hi, there! My name is Sarina Oshiro (she/her/hers). I am a Political Communication major at George Washington University, School of Media and Public Affairs.

On this page, you will find a few examples of my previous writing as well as creative products developed in R-studio.

Please reach out to me at sarinaoshiro\@gwu.edu with any inquiries. Thank you!
